DESIGN.DESIGN_DESCRIPTION: Virus-like particles (VLPs) were enriched by using NetoVIR, followed by random amplification using WTA2 and libraries were prepared by using Nextera XT DNA Library Preparation Kit. Human reads were removed using bowtie2 with very-sensitive settings.
